ED_Title: Proposed programme of work and timetable of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) for the seventy-sixth session of the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 41st plenary meeting, on 10 December 2020, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) (A/75/422),  approved the proposed programme of work and timetable of the Fourth Committee for the seventy-sixth session of the Assembly, as set out in the report of the Committee.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
